original_title: Carlos Santana and Wayne Shorter – Live at the Montreux Jazz Festival
overview: Live at Montreux Jazz Festival is a live album by guitarist Carlos Santana and saxophonist Wayne Shorter that was released in 2005. The album is a record of their performance at the Montreux Jazz Festival on July 14, 1988.
title: Carlos Santana and Wayne Shorter – Live at the Montreux Jazz Festival
